# [[epidemic]] nature {{gloss|being highly contagious}}

====Usage notes====
This term nearly always occurs in compounds, specifically names of epidemic diseases such as {{l|ja|流行性感冒|gloss=influenza}}. The term for an epidemic, or an outbreak of highly contagious disease, is {{l/ja|流行病}}.
